ingredients.item: 2 Select Farm lightly smoked salmon fillets (from the service counter)
80g bunch flat leaf parsley, finely chopped

instructions.step: Place the salmon in a frying pan, cover with milk, stock and thyme and bring to the boil for 2-4 minutes, then cool.

Spray a large pan with oil and cook the leeks until softened. Lift the salmon out and pour the cooking liquid into the pan of leeks. Add the potato and lentils and cook for 30 minutes. Flake the fish and stir into the chowder along with the parsley.
